con:testCase.name: Add

con:config.script:
/*Read in the next line of the file We can use the same fileReader created in the Setup script because it was assigned to the context variable.*/ nextLine = context.fileReader.readLine()
/*If the end of the file hasn't been reached (nextLine does NOT equal null) split the line and assign new property values, rename test request steps, and go back to the first test request step*/ if(nextLine != null){ String[] propData = nextLine.split(",") curTC = testRunner.testCase curTC.setPropertyValue("xValue",propData[0]) curTC.setPropertyValue("yValue",propData[1]) curTC.setPropertyValue("sumValue",propData[2]) curTC.getTestStepAt(0).setName("add-" + propData[0] + "-" + propData[1] + "-" + propData[2]) testRunner.gotoStep(0) }
